### Image:

### Important Lessons

Make sure to follow all technical writing rules mentioned below when rewriting government documents for eventual release to the public:

1.  Use official English names and descriptions of codes (e.g. UNSPSC) 
2.  When documenting a notice, organize the notice details by using logical and predictable sectioning 
3.  Always ensure there are quality review ratings prior to formally releasing your rewritten notice to the general public

**Assess
